allow: Bash(else echo ".env not tracked in git")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: Total codebase cleanup - eliminate 4,934 files of technical debt

MAJOR REFACTOR: Comprehensive cleanup removing dead code, duplicates, and artifacts

## Summary
- Deleted 4,934 files totaling 4.4 MB
- Reduced root Python files by 91% (64 â†’ 6)
- Reduced root documentation by 73% (37 â†’ 10)
- Eliminated 100% of duplicate routes and services
- Removed all compilation artifacts and archive directories

## Changes

### Removed
- 58 root-level analysis/debug/test scripts
- 5 archive/backup directories (archive/, security_fixes_backup/, legacy_scripts/, fixes/, remediation/)
- 4,762 compilation artifacts (.pyc files, __pycache__ directories)
- 8 duplicate route files (auth_api.py, auth/standardized_routes.py, spotify_routes.py, spotify_api.py, api_fixed.py, etc.)
- 2 duplicate service files (enhanced_voice_interface.py, emotion_aware_wellness_companion.py)
- 15 outdated documentation files (fix reports, OAuth troubleshooting, historical status docs, replit.md)

### Added
- docs/ directory for organized technical/business documentation
- REFACTOR_SUMMARY.md - Executive summary
- RefactorTracker_2025-12-18.md - Complete forensic analysis

### Changed
- Moved 12 technical/business docs to docs/ directory
- Organized root to contain only core documentation

### Fixed
- Removed files with Python syntax errors (auth_api.py, auth/standardized_routes.py)
- Eliminated all duplicate route implementations
- Cleaned repository of all compilation artifacts

## Impact
- Code quality: MASSIVE improvement
- Repository cleanliness: 100% compilation artifacts removed
- Documentation: Clear separation of core vs technical docs
- Maintainability: Eliminated duplicate code paths

See CHANGELOG.md, REFACTOR_SUMMARY.md, and RefactorTracker_2025-12-18.md for complete details.

EOF
)")
